At Kent Photography, we focus on creating a memorable experience.

With decades of entrepreneurial and photographic experience, Kent photography offers diverse services from fine art photography to photo restoration services.

Connect with Bill

A professional photographer for 40 years, Bill's diverse skill set makes him the perfect fit for a variety of clients seeking photographic work. Everything from commercial and industrial work to pet portraiture, Bill will be able to help you with all of your requests.
